entry.title: Standards for HTML emails?
entry.content: After a couple of attempts that ended not-so-well, I gave up on HTML emails. I advise people to work with someone who's an expert with them, or to at least use templates that are known to work, and then I wish them well. At a job interview I actually proclaimed my active dislike of HTML emails and general unwillingness to muck with them -- I'm not sure that went over so well. The news that Outlook 2007 actually took a giant leap backwards in HTML support seals the deal for me. Still, it's good to read that some people are trying to bring some sanity to the situation. I wish them luck.
